2B0803D3.Line7.AF573: I am Aria, scholar of druidic studies, at your service. I’m on my way to Túr Dúlra, but the journey is too dangerous for me alone.

5D2A974D.Line1.AF573: You seem to know your way around here. Is it true? Have the druids returned to Túr Dúlra?

91138A51.Line5.AF573: Will you help--oh. I haven't told you what I need or who I am, have I?

C4FC7D55.Line9.AF573: Will you accompany me? I'll make it worth your while.

F71F10CF.Line3.AF573: Imagine all the knowledge held in one place, the secrets it could reveal, the things one could discover!
